subtitle: ={{$parameter["operation"] + ": " + $parameter["resource"]}}
description: Create, change and delete boards and cards

options.name: Create

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an attachment

options.name: Get

properties.name: cardId

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Trello Card URL
Not a valid Trello Card ID

properties.description: The ID of the card

properties.name: url
properties.description: The URL of the attachment to add

options.name: mimeType
options.description: The MIME type of the attachment to add

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the attachment to add

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the attachment to delete

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of fields.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the attachment to get

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of fields.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the board

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the board

options.name: prefs_cardAging
options.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled

options.name: prefs_background
options.description: The ID of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey

options.name: prefs_comments
options.description: Who can comment on cards on this board

options.name: prefs_cardCovers
options.description: Whether card covers are enabled

options.name: prefs_invitations
options.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join

options.name: keepFromSource
options.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value cards

options.name: defaultLabels
options.description: Whether to use the default set of labels

options.name: defaultLists
options.description: Whether to add the default set of lists to a board(To Do, Doing, Done).It is ignored if idBoardSource is provided

options.name: idOrganization
options.description: The ID or name of the team the board should belong to

options.name: prefs_permissionLevel
options.description: The permissions level of the board

options.name: powerUps
options.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board

options.name: prefs_selfJoin
options.description: Whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited

options.name: idBoardSource
options.description: The ID of a board to copy into the new board

options.name: prefs_voting
options.description: Who can vote on this board

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the board

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Trello Board URL
Not a valid Trello Board ID

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: closed, dateLastActivity, dateLastView, desc, descData, idOrganization, invitations, invited, labelNames, memberships, name, pinned, powerUps, prefs, shortLink, shortUrl, starred, subscribed, URL.

options.name: pluginData
options.description: Whether to include pluginData on the card with the response

options.name: closed
options.description: Whether the board is closed

options.name: desc
options.description: New description of the board

options.name: name
options.description: New name of the board

options.name: idOrganization
options.description: The ID of the team the board should be moved to

options.name: subscribed
options.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the board to get members from

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the board to add member to

properties.name: idMember
properties.description: The ID of the member to add to the board

properties.name: type

options.name: Normal
options.description: Invite as normal member

options.name: Admin
options.description: Invite as admin

options.name: Observer
options.description: Invite as observer (Trello premium feature)

properties.description: Determines the type of membership the user being added should have

options.name: allowBillableGuest
options.description: Whether to allow organization admins to add multi-board guests onto a board

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the board to invite member to

properties.name: email
properties.description: The ID of the board to update

options.name: type
Normal
options.description: Invite as normal member

options.name: Admin
options.description: Invite as admin

options.name: Observer
options.description: Invite as observer (Trello premium feature)
Determines the type of membership the user being added should have

options.name: fullName
options.description: The full name of the user to add as a member of the board. Must have a length of at least 1 and cannot begin nor end with a space.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The ID of the board to remove member from

properties.name: idMember
properties.description: The ID of the member to remove from the board

properties.name: listId
properties.description: The ID of the list to create card in

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the card

properties.name: description
properties.description: The description of the card

options.name: due
options.description: A due date for the card

options.name: dueComplete
options.description: Whether the card is completed

options.name: pos
options.description: The position of the new card. top, bottom, or a positive float.

options.name: idMembers
options.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to add to the card

options.name: idLabels
options.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to add to the card

options.name: urlSource
options.description: A source URL to attach to card

options.name: idCardSource
options.description: The ID of a card to copy into the new card

options.name: keepFromSource
options.description: If using idCardSource you can specify which properties to copy over. all or comma-separated list of: attachments, checklists, comments, due, labels, members, stickers.

properties.name: id

properties.errorMessage: Not a valid Trello Card URL
Not a valid Trello Card ID

properties.description: The ID of the card

options.name: fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: badges, checkItemStates, closed, dateLastActivity, desc, descData, due, email, idBoard, idChecklists, idLabels, idList, idMembers, idShort, idAttachmentCover, manualCoverAttachment, labels, name, pos, shortUrl, url.

options.name: board
options.description: Whether to return the board object the card is on

options.name: board_fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: name, desc, descData, closed, idOrganization, pinned, url, prefs.

options.name: customFieldItems
options.description: Whether to include the customFieldItems

options.name: members
options.description: Whether to return member objects for members on the card

options.name: member_fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list: avatarHash, fullName, initials, username.

options.name: pluginData
options.description: Whether to include pluginData on the card with the response

options.name: stickers
options.description: Whether to include sticker models with the response

options.name: sticker_fields
options.description: Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of sticker fields.

options.name: idAttachmentCover
options.description: The ID of the image attachment the card should use as its cover, or null for none

options.name: idBoard
options.description: The ID of the board the card should be on

options.name: closed
options.description: Whether the board is closed

options.name: desc
options.description: New description of the board

options.name: due
options.description: A due date for the card

options.name: dueComplete
options.description: Whether the card is completed

options.name: idLabels
options.description: Comma-separated list of label IDs to set on card

options.name: idList
options.description: The ID of the list the card should be in

options.name: idMembers
options.description: Comma-separated list of member IDs to set on card

options.name: name
options.description: New name of the board

options.name: pos
options.description: The position of the card. top, bottom, or a positive float.

options.name: subscribed
options.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board
